alert.note: Alert for Chickasaw; Lee; Monroe; Pontotoc (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 01 at 4:46PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Chickasaw, southeastern Pontotoc, southwestern Lee and northwestern Monroe Counties through 515 PM CDT... At 445 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Okolona, moving northwest at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Tupelo, Verona, Okolona, Trace State Park, Shannon, New Wren, Troy, Furrs, Nettleton, Chiwapa, Palmetto, Bissell, Chesterville, Leotis, Old Union, Wallfield, Wren and George P Cossar State Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
